undecided
Class IceBlock

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      undecided.IceBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
public class IceBlock
extends java.util.Observable
implements Item

This class is an item that will appear on any map. If either of the tanks run into an ice block, the opposing tank's speed will be set to 2 for 2 seconds before it can move again.

Author:
Team Exception
See Also:
Item, PlayerTank, EnemyTank

Constructor Summary
IceBlock(Point p, Map map)
          This is the class constructor for the IceBlock class and sets the location of the ice block, creates a collision rectangle, and on which map it is on.
